course_title: Special Advanced Topics - FLOT FDMT & APPL

201.comments: Please email course instructor for registrationStudents from outside the department wanting to take any of the following courses (MINE 292, MINE 331, MINE 333, MINE 590J, MINE 581, MINE 462/566, MINE 438/590P, MINE 434/ 577, MINE 224) are required to complete the following safety requirements before registering in the course http://mining.ubc.ca/safety/safety-requirements/.   You will be waitlisted until you have met the requirements.

description: A special advanced course may be arranged upon the approval of the department head.
